Class Binary

  • java.lang.Object
    • Binary

  • public class Binary
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods for converting between binary and decimal.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BINARY_LENGTH
      Class constant defines the length of binary numbers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Binary() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long binToSDec(boolean[] b)
      Converts a two's complement binary nubmer to signed decimal
      static long binToUDec(boolean[] b)
      Converts an unsigned binary nubmer to unsigned decimal
      static boolean[] sDecToBin(long d)
      Converts a signed decimal nubmer to two's complement binary
      static java.lang.String toHexString(boolean[] b)
      Returns a hexadecimal representation of the unsigned binary number.

      Returns a string representation of the binary number.

      Converts an unsigned decimal nubmer to binary

    • Method Detail

      • binToSDec

        public static long binToSDec(boolean[] b)
        Converts a two's complement binary nubmer to signed decimal
        Parameters:
        b - The two's complement binary number
        Returns:
        The equivalent decimal value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Parameter array length is not BINARY_LENGTH.

      • binToUDec

        public static long binToUDec(boolean[] b)
        Converts an unsigned binary nubmer to unsigned decimal
        Parameters:
        b - The unsigned binary number
        Returns:
        The equivalent decimal value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Parameter array length is not BINARY_LENGTH.

      • sDecToBin

        public static boolean[] sDecToBin(long d)
        Converts a signed decimal nubmer to two's complement binary
        Parameters:
        d - The decimal value
        Returns:
        The equivalent two's complement binary representation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Parameter is outside valid range.

      • uDecToBin

        public static boolean[] uDecToBin(long d)
        Converts an unsigned decimal nubmer to binary
        Parameters:
        d - The decimal value
        Returns:
        The equivalent binary representation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Parameter is outside valid range.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(boolean[] b)
        Returns a string representation of the binary number. Uses an underscore to separate each group of 4 bits.
        Parameters:
        b - The binary number
        Returns:
        The string representation of the binary number.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Parameter array length is not BINARY_LENGTH.

      • toHexString

        public static java.lang.String toHexString(boolean[] b)
        Returns a hexadecimal representation of the unsigned binary number. Uses an underscore to separate each group of 4 characters.
        Parameters:
        b - The binary number
        Returns:
        The hexadecimal representation of the binary number.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Parameter array length is not BINARY_LENGTH.
